segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s standing in a puddle of water, and it’s spreading fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress is going to get soaked if she doesn’t move soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she’s so focused on that one plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is already dripping down the cabinets, ruining the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s going to slip and fall if she doesn’t look down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are up to no good, but she’s oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
